Ingredients.1: 1 large head cauliflower, cut into small chunks

Ingredients.2: 4  hard-cooked eggs, or more to taste - chopped

Ingredients.3: 1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)

Ingredients.9: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Place cauliflower into a microwave-safe bowl, cover, and cook in microwave oven until tender, about 7 minutes. Uncover and cool for 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Stir eggs, creamy salad dressing, celery, green onions, sour cream, apple cider vinegar, sugar, salt, and black pepper in a bowl until thoroughly combined. Mix cauliflower into dressing. Chill at least 1 hour before serving.
